divs: sighting detailsafter my experiences i decided to tape or record my observations. i send my early records to mufon which is below [links moved to additional evidence section\cms\tg] i was get my camera for 15\june\2011 ecl������pse also i was an inner expectation that will see an ufo. i was thinking to eclipse and ufos during, walking at the sea-side for turn back home. when i was walking on the street i just look up in the air. but i had a feeling somthing to look up in the air first.(supposing it tend me to itself) my first notice was it was a ufo beacuse i feel it, i observed the light and acts as in ufo category. light was like flourescent, no signal lamps, very slowly moving like skying\sliding in the sky, no voice approximately over at my top. i just focused to record the video good, i feel very happyness which mixed some exite. it disappeared slowly go out of my visual area. thank you. [name removed\cms\tg].
Summary: 2 Minute UFO sighting at city centre Turkey/IZMIR
